We love Scarra and he is 100% in LPP! This isn't an exhaustive list of our League Partners, nor the awesome humans who we are trying to support make TFT content.

We have nothing but respect for Hafu’s amazing achievement! This event though is limited to League Partners only, but we do have other TFT activities in mind that will be more welcoming to creators outside of LPP later down the road.

Actually the last paragraph says this “For our players, we have something special for you as well. We will be keeping an eye on the top players in NA outside of these creators for some surprises of your own.“
Stay tuned. :)

Many thanks to Riot for making an amazing new game mode. Played it tons on PBE and playing it as often as I can get a queue on the live servers. It's addicting beyond all reason. Damn good job and thanks again.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

"We will be keeping an eye on the top players in NA outside of these creators for some surprises of your own."

Is that referring to MMR, or the point scoring system above?
The last paragraph refers to MMR/wins, not the point scoring system for LPP. Though if you send us an MS Paint of a Little Legend, you’d give us a smile. :)
Will do!

I may have misunderstood the wording from the article, apologies!! Just wanted to correct that we may be watching the most engaged players, not necessarily the highest MMR. I'm sorry for the misinformation! We were intentionally vague so we don't encourage any abuse of the system, but I still apologize for leading you astray.
